title: Looking to start a ranked team. After a jungle and mid.
body: Over the team we have right now and would like to start a new 1. SuperSquirter Top, Rouen ADC, Bootscooter Support. We'd like a jungle and mid laner please. On the OCE server and would like to get to atleast gold 2. Please post your available times. The 3 of us always skype while playing and know how we work. Normals for practice and fun. Ranked for serious play. Cheers.

replies.body: Plat 5 here. I would be happy to join
Add Rouen Boostscooter or SuperSquirter if interested
Hey yea i would love to join but is there any rank requirements?
theres no ranked requirments. wel like to have fun and want to improve. We're over the ranked team we're in hence why we want to start a new 1. add me if you're interested
hey I just got into bronze 2 and I main jg/top and sup add me my ign is SezzoTheOne
